types.name: Extensions
types.description: Extensions are small add-ons that add new functionality to Pale Moon, from a simple toolbar button to a completely new feature. They allow you to customize the browser to fit your own needs and preferences, while letting us keep the core itself light and lean.

types.name: Themes
types.description: Themes allow you to change the look and feel of the user interface and personalize it to your tastes. A theme can simply change the colors of the UI or it can change every aspect of its appearance.

types.name: Language Packs
types.description: Language packs change the language of the entire application.

types.name: Dictionaries
types.description: Dictionaries add a new language option to your application, which checks your spelling when you fill out Web forms.

addons.name: Tagalog/Filipino Dictionary
addons.description: A Filipino language spellchecker based on the current orthography.

addons.name: The Good 'ol Sidebar
addons.description: Sidebar control with award-winning user experience!

addons.name: NoteStruck
addons.description: A quick and easy note-taking solution. A fork of QuickFox Notes by InBasic.

addons.name: Splashed
addons.description: Adds a splash screen when the application is launched.

addons.name: Periodic Table of XUL Elements
addons.description: A collection of XUL demos in a small add-on.

addons.name: Reload and Skip Cache
addons.description: Expands the visibility of "Hard Refresh" in many areas of the browser.

addons.name: Swarth
addons.description: Modifies web pages to use a dark color scheme or based on the user's preferences.

addons.name: Toolbox Plus
addons.description: Provides more customization options for toolbars.

addons.name: Material Moon
addons.description: Material Chrome-like theme for Pale Moon. Based on Lootyhoof's PMChrome.

addons.name: Milestone 10
addons.description: Features the look of early Mozilla builds (M4-M10).

addons.name: Moonscape
addons.description: A full featured retro theme that looks like Netscape 4.x.

addons.name: Moonscape Icon Pack
addons.description: Modifies the window icons to match Netscape 4.x.

addons.name: Phosphor Green
addons.description: Relive the monochrome screens of yesterday!

addons.name: Stratum
addons.description: Features old-style squared tabs, toolbar buttons and icons with blue glow.

addons.name: Aeromoon
addons.description: Experience all the benefits of Pale Moon with the colorful toolbar goodness of Firefox 3 Aero (Win Vista/7 theme)! Fork of "Firefox 3 theme for Firefox 4+ Reloaded!" by dallasthemaster and Jeremy Morton.

addons.name: Australium
addons.description: Experience the curved tabs of Australis, now on Pale Moon!

addons.name: Camimoon
addons.description: The colourful icons of Camino, re-imagined for Pale Moon.

addons.name: Compact Moon
addons.description: A very clean and compact theme with classic buttons that minimizes vertical space consumed by menus & tool bars. Fork of "Classic Compact" by Ken Barbalace.

addons.name: Dark Moon
addons.description: The ultimate dark experience.

addons.name: DarkPitch
addons.description: Minimalistic, dark-colored theme. Fork of "PitchDark" by Tim Banker.

addons.name: Fox 2 The Moon
addons.description: The default Firefox 2 theme for Pale Moon. Fork of "Firefox 2, the theme, reloaded" by rctgamer3 et al.

addons.name: Kempelton Reloaded
addons.description: Remake of the beautiful Kempelton theme by Arvid Axelsson for Pale Moon.

addons.name: LittleMoon
addons.description: LittleMoon, designed for optimal screen usage, leaving lots of room for browsing. Based on icons from art.gnome.org. Fork of "LittleFox" by Alfred Kayser.

addons.name: MacMoon
addons.description: The default Firefox 2 theme for Mac, now for Pale Moon!

addons.name: Maxi3
addons.description: Maxthon like theme for Pale Moon. Fork of "MX3" by dkgo.

addons.name: Maxi4
addons.description: Maxthon 4 like theme for Pale Moon. Fork of "mx4" by dkgo

addons.name: MicroMoon
addons.description: MicroMoon, designed for optimal screen usage, leaving lots of room for browsing. Based on icons from art.gnome.org. Fork of "MicroFox" by Alfred Kayser.

addons.name: Modoki Moon
addons.description: Remake of the Modern Modoki theme for Pale Moon.

addons.name: Moonfox3
addons.description: Experience all the benefits of Pale Moon with the colorful toolbar goodness of Firefox 3! Fork of "Firefox 3 theme for Firefox 4+ Reloaded!" by dallasthemaster and Jeremy Morton.

addons.name: Moonola
addons.description: Theme based on the Nuvola icon set. Fork of "Nuvola FF" by Richard Marti.

addons.name: Nauticalia
addons.description: Theme based on the Nuvola icon set. Fork of "Nuvola FF" by Richard Marti.

addons.name: Noia Moon
addons.description: Theme for Pale Moon based on Noia Iconpack by Carlitus (deviantART). Fork of "Noia Fox" by David.Vincent.

addons.name: Opresto
addons.description: Opera Presto theme for Pale Moon. Fork of "FXOpera" (Presto version) by dkgo.

addons.name: Past Modern Revisited
addons.description: Remake of the classic Past Modern theme by Kuden for Pale Moon.

addons.name: Phoenity Rebirth
addons.description: Experience the Phoenity Aura theme, alive once again! Based on Phoenity Aura icons by cheeaun.

addons.name: Photonic
addons.description: The Quantum "Photon" theme beamed at the XUL.

addons.name: PMChrome
addons.description: Chrome like theme for Pale Moon. Fork of "FXChrome" by dkgo.

addons.name: PMOpera
addons.description: Opera like theme for Pale Moon. Fork of "FXOpera" by dkgo.

addons.name: Qute 4 PM
addons.description: Customized version of Arvid Axelsson's great theme with the new Qute 4 icon set. Fork of "Qute 4++ (custom mod)" by Murphy.

addons.name: Qute Large
addons.description: Large version of the Qute theme by Arvid Axelsson for Pale Moon. Based on "Qute 3++" using icons from "Qute Classic".

addons.name: Qute Legacy
addons.description: Customized version of Arvid Axelsson's great theme. Fork of "Qute 3++" by Murphy.

addons.name: reinheit
addons.description: das Monochrom wiederbelebung. (Fork of "rein" by Naoto Kusumi)

addons.name: Tangerinemoon
addons.description: Theme with Tangerine icons for Pale Moon. A variant of the Tango-theme. Fork of "Tangerinefox" by Haven667.

addons.name: Tangomoon
addons.description: Theme with Tango icons for Pale Moon. Fork of "Tangofox" by Haven667.

addons.name: Walnutty
addons.description: Walnutty, based on icons from art.gnome.org. A nice, wooden/nutty theme for Pale Moon. Fork of "Walnut for Firefox" by Alfred Kayser.

addons.name: White Moon
addons.description: Paint your Pale Moon white. Make it look simpler, nicer. Fork of "Simple White" by Louis Chan.

addons.name: XMoon
addons.description: MacOSX theme for Pale Moon. Fork of "MacOSX Theme (Firefox 4+)" by GOLF-AT.

addons.name: Home Styler
addons.description: Make your about:home page stylish!

addons.name: Stylem
addons.description: Restyle the web with Stylem, a user styles manager.

addons.name: MozArchiver
addons.description: Save exactly what you see, in a single file. MAFF (based on ZIP) is compact and exceptional for video and audio. MHT (Internet Explorer's format) allows easy exchange with IE users. Store many tabs, find original, and more!

addons.name: Winstripe Moon
addons.description: A Pale Moon theme using some of the Firefox 1.x Winstripe icons.

addons.name: Black Moon
addons.description: Black minimalistic theme.

addons.name: Halloween
addons.description: A special theme for Hallowe'en by Goodydino (originally Ed Hume).

addons.name: In The Dark
addons.description: A dark, simple, grayscale theme for Pale Moon.

addons.name: In The Dark (Bloodmoon Edition)
addons.description: A dark, simple, red-tinted theme for Pale Moon.

addons.name: GitHub/GitLab Web Components Polyfill
addons.description: Ensures that all GitHub and GitLab scripts required for UXP and SeaMonkey are loaded correctly.
